ygData.subject: Compiling problem...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, While installing the C++ version of Cantera I encoutred some problems. I am sure they are not related to the program itself, but to the compiler options

Subject: Compiling problem...

Hi,
While installing the C++ version of Cantera I encoutred some problems. I
am sure they are not related to the program itself, but to the compiler
options and am looking for some guideance on how to solve them.


First of all, I am using windows environment. Although I have Microsoft
Visual C++, I don't have the corresponding fortran version. Therefore I
used Microsoft Developer Studio to compile the following libraries:
recipes.lib, ctlapack.lib, ctblas.lib.

After this I am still getting a compilation error associated with the
external "C" command in the code. The message is:


cantera.lib(DenseMatrix.obj= : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol
_dgetrs_
There are 13 errors like this. All related with the external "C" command
in the code.

I will really appreciate any help on how to solve this problem.


Thanks,

Alejandro Molina
